name: Gravity Falls Season 2
summary: Dipper and Mabel Pines spend the summer at their great uncle's tourist trap, The Mystery Shack. They think it's just going to be another usual summer, until mysterious things begin occurring all over town.
info:
• 中文名: 怪诞小镇 第二季
  • 话数: 20
  • 放送开始: 2014-08-01
  • 放送星期: 星期五
  • 动画制作: Disney Television Animation
  • 官方网站: http://disneyxd.disney.com/gravity-falls
  • 播放电视台: Disney XD
  • 导演: John Aoshima / Aaron Springer / Joe Pitt
  • 编剧: Alex Hirsch

eps.name: Scary-oke
eps.desc: The Pines family begin resolving to get back to normal after the Li'l Gideon incident. They throw a “Mystery Shack Is Back” party, but some unwelcome guests intend to crash it.

eps.name: Into the Bunker
eps.desc: Dipper’s secret journal pages lead him and the gang to the author’s hidden bunker where they find themselves face-to-face with a mysterious figure from Gravity Falls’ lore.

eps.name: The Golf War
eps.desc: After being belittled by Pacifica one too many times, Mabel challenges her to a miniature golf-off which gets a tad out of control when some local residents offer their help.

eps.name: Sock Opera
eps.desc: Mabel decides to put on a sock puppet rock opera to impress a local puppeteer, but her show goes awry when Dipper’s drive to uncover journal secrets leads to a supernatural disaster.

eps.name: Soos and the Real Girl
eps.desc: Soos needs a date for his cousin Reggie’s engagement party and looks to a dating simulator game to help him talk to girls.

eps.name: Little Gift Shop of Horrors
eps.desc: In three separate mysterious tales, Stan is cursed by a Witch, Waddles accidentally eats a bowl of brain-enhancing jelly and builds a machine that allows him to speak for the first time, and Mabel faces her fear of Claymotion.

eps.name: Society of the Blind Eye
eps.desc: The kids, along with Old Man McGucket's help, discover there is a secret society in Gravity Falls.

eps.name: Blendin's Game
eps.desc: Blendin Blandin returns to face off with Dipper and Mabel in a futuristic battle that could trap them forever in time jail.

eps.name: The Love God
eps.desc: Mabel takes matchmaking too far when she steals a love potion from a real Love God.

eps.name: Northwest Mansion Noir
eps.desc: Pacifica enlists Dipper’s help to rid the Northwest Mansion of a ghost before he wreaks havoc on her fancy party. Nathan Fillion (ABC's "Castle") reprises his role as Pacifica's father, Preston Northwest.

eps.name: Not What He Seems
eps.desc: After government agents take Stan into custody, Dipper and Mabel question how much they really know about their Grunkle Stan.

eps.name: A Tale Of Two Stans
eps.desc: Cornered underneath the Mystery Shack, Stan must finally reveal the secrets of his past and his mysterious portal to Dipper and Mabel.
